directions: Place edamame into a large pot and cover with salted water. Place over medium-low heat, bring to a simmer, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes; drain.
Puree garlic in food processor until minced. Add edamame, tahini, water, cilantro, lemon juice, olive oil, kosher salt, cumin, and cayenne pepper; blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen shelled edamame (green soybeans)
title: Cilantro Edamame Hummus | Allrecipes
